title: 4.3 Growth follow up at the Pre-scolary consultation

nbr_of_children_on_middle_line_growth_ch.fr: Nb d’enfants sous la courbe centrale de la fiche de croissance
nbr_of_children_on_middle_line_growth_ch.en: Nbr of children on middle line growth chart

nbr_of_high_balanced_malnutriation_cases.en: Nbr of high balanced malnutriation cases

nbr_of_high_severe_malnutrition_cases.en: Nbr of High severe malnutrition cases

nbr_of_high_balanced_malnutriation_refer.fr: Nb cas malnutrition aiguë sévère référés
nbr_of_high_balanced_malnutriation_refer.en: Nbr of high balanced malnutriation refered cases

nbr_of_children_showing_psychologic_trau.fr: Nb enfants présentant un retard psychomoteur
nbr_of_children_showing_psychologic_trau.en: Nbr of children showing psychologic trauma

avarage_of_refered_high_severe_malunutri.fr: Proportion enfants Malnutrition sévère référés = Nb enfants au stade 3 référés / Nb enfants au stade 3 x 100
avarage_of_refered_high_severe_malunutri.en: Avarage of refered high severe malunutrition children =Nbr of children at stage 3 refered/nbr of children at stage 3x100

average_of_children_with_insufficiency.fr: Proportion d’enfants avec insuffisance pondérale=  Nb d’enfants sous la courbe centrale de la fiche de croissance X 100/Nb d’enfants de 0-59 mois attendus à la CPS
average_of_children_with_insufficiency.en: Average of children with insufficiency = Nbr of children under the growth line of the chart x 100/Nbr of children from 0-59 months who attended at the PSC

average_of_children_from_0_11_months_who.fr: Proportion des enfants de 0-11 mois ayant reçu une MIILD = Nombre d'enfants de 0-11 mois ayant reçu une MILD lors des visites préscolaires X 100 / Total enfants reçus à la 1ėre visite préscolaire
average_of_children_from_0_11_months_who.en: Average of children from 0-11 months who received a MILD =Nbr of children from 0-11 months who received a MILD during PSC visit x100/total children seen at the 1st PSC visit

among_the_new_cases_at_psc.en: Among the new cases at PSC
among_the_new_cases_at_psc.title: Among the new cases at PSC
